content: **crochet baby blanket with zigzag pattern in drops alpaca** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** small blanket width = 65 cm / 25½ length = 83 cm / 32¾ large blanket width = 75 cm / 29½ length = 83 cm / 32¾ **materials** drops alpaca from garnstudio 200-250 g color no 0100 off-white 100-100 g color no 3770 dark fuchsia 100-100 g color no 2921 cerise 100-100 g color no 3720 violet 50 - 50 g color no 3140 light pink drops crochet hook size 5 mm / us h/8 or size needed to get correct gauge **pattern links ** danish version 1 french version 2 1 http //garnstudio com/lang/dk/visoppskrift php d_nr=b16&d_id=24&lang=dk 2 http //www garnstudio com/lang/fr/visoppskrift php d_nr=b16&d_id=24
